bridge.toolkit.util
Class URNMapper

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.util.URNMapper

public class URNMapper
extends java.lang.Object

Generates a urn_resource_map.xml file that is used to map each file in the resource package by file name to the S1000D URN.

          Walks through the List of files that represent all of the files in the resource package and generates a urn_resource_map.xml file that is used to map each file by file name to the S1000D URN.

getSourceFiles

public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getSourceFiles(java.lang.String src_dir)
Retrieves all of the files in a specified directory and returns them in a list.

Parameters:
src_dir - String that represents the location of directory.
Returns:
List List of all of the files found in the source directory.

writeURNMap

public static org.jdom.Document writeURNMap(java.util.List<java.io.File> src_files,
                                            java.lang.String directoryDepth)
Walks through the List of files that represent all of the files in the resource package and generates a urn_resource_map.xml file that is used to map each file by file name to the S1000D URN.

Parameters:
src_files - List of all of the files found in the resources package.
directoryDepth - String that add padding for the directory depth if needed.
Returns:
Document JDOM Document that represents the urn_resource_map.xml file.

writeUrn

private static org.jdom.Element writeUrn(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String file_name,
                                         java.lang.String directoryDepth)
Creates a 'urn' element for each file in the resource package to be added to the urn_resource_map.xml file.

Parameters:
name - String that represents the URN of the given file.
file_name - String that represents the actual file name for each file.
directoryDepth - String that add padding for the directory depth if needed.
Returns:
Element JDOM Element
